name: Elasticsearch
description:
Elasticsearch plugin allows you to access Elasticsearch cluster, browse and edit your data and perform REST API requests.

Documentation | Issues Tracker

Features:

  • Browse data in Table or JSON view with ability to sort and hide fields
  • Query DSL autocomplete
  • Search using Kibana Query Language with fields autocomplete
  • List of clusters and indices with short information
  • Create, Update or Delete documents
  • SSH, SSL and AWS request signing
  • Support all Elasticsearch versions
  • Much more!
notes:
• Query DSL autocomplete
  • Added full json response view mode
  • View mode settings moved to toolbar
  • View orientation settings moved to Preferences->Tools->Elasticsearch
  • Configuring history size
  • Fixed some bugs
